about_the_game:
About the soundtrack


This soundtrack is made for the game by the name of The Colorful Creature. By semi-popular request, people wanted an official soundtrack for the game and we are here to deliver. Enjoy the 40+ songs that are included in this playlist!

This official soundtrack contains a playlist that has most of the songs in a high quality 320kbps .mp3 format. This playlist will keep updating when the base game also receives brand new songs!

IMPORTANT: If steam crashes when you play songs, it's because of the steam music player. Just find the songs where you downloaded them and listen them from there.
